definition: (of a story etc) to unfold/to play out/to develop (a technique etc)/to enact/(logic) to deduce/to infer
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act

sentences.english: The historic rivalries of Ivy League universities in the United States have reached the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 美國常青藤聯盟大學的歷史性競爭演繹到了互聯網上。

sentences.english: The melt of slim yellow and pink is deducing the subject of love forever.
sentences.chinese: 昏黃與粉色調的交織，輕輕演繹永久不變的愛的主題。

sentences.english: The application of law mainly uses deductive inference or syllogism inference.
sentences.chinese: 法官適用法律中主要運用演繹推理或三段論推理。

sentences.english: It reinterprets the two traditions and creates a new classic.
sentences.chinese: 將兩個傳統進行了重新的演繹，製作出一個新的經典。

sentences.english: The Cold War was also a sporting war, with US–Soviet rivalries played out every four years.
sentences.chinese: 冷戰也體現在體育對抗上，每四年演繹一場美蘇對抗。

sentences.english: The larger rear block plays on a composition of projecting and recessed balconies.
sentences.chinese: 較大的背面區塊上組成了陽臺凹凸有致的聯合演繹。

sentences.english: As with all graffiti, the interpretation of the piece is left up to the viewer.
sentences.chinese: 對於所有的塗鴉來說，作品所演繹的概念在乎觀者。

sentences.english: The lines are different, depending on how each and everyone improvises .
sentences.chinese: 臺詞不盡相同，如何演繹，則在於個人即興創作。

sentences.english: If you remember we looked at deductive arguments sound.
sentences.chinese: 如果你記得我們看演繹論點的完好。

sentences.english: Maiden complain"has been the eternal theme of the female literature of minority nationalities."
sentences.chinese: 古代少數民族女性文學一直演繹着“閨怨”的情緒。
我最喜愛的“父親”“祖父”演繹者。

sentences.english: No matter what themes, he whole heart to deduce songs in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 無論什麼主題，他都全心去演繹出歌曲的神采。

sentences.english: Okay now lets look at deductive argument first.
sentences.chinese: 好現在我們首先來看看演繹論點。

sentences.english: Deduct all of the goodliness things as much as one likes.
sentences.chinese: 盡情演繹人間的一切美好事物。

sentences.english: Love soaked in paper, deduce sadness.
sentences.chinese: 䄑翱愛情浸過紙，演繹憂傷。

sentences.english: They are naturally co-creations based on a push and pull of projection and interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 它們是自然互生，基於一種推和拉的投射和演繹。
